title: You are now in an Arranged Marriage with your favorite champion
body:
How do you feel
{{champion:44}}:  http://fc09.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2013/138/5/6/battle_bunny_taric_by_ingridarcher-d65pxn6.jpg "I would go gay for him"

replies.body: {{champion:76}} What should I expect from this?
"No officer, I can explain! She's a *human*! She only turns into a cougar!"
Here's the secret: *She's always a cougar*

{{champion:119}} 
I found our wedding photo

{{champion:105}} would probably troll poll away
{{champion:8}} hopefully I don't get aids
{{champion:268}} that threesome....I mean foursome....I mean fivesome.
{{champion:268}} From sexytimes to gangbangs in just 12/11/10/9/8 seconds.

http://www.noobabble.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/Azir-R2.png
"Shibity, bibity, boo, Gunna get dat booty" ;)

{{champion:161}}

I've seen enough hentai to know how this will end...
http://i.imgur.com/tXQnoaH.gif

{{champion:266}} Send help
Please

{{champion:38}} ...can this just be a chillbro relationship? I'll help him find his wife and daughter :3
{{champion:75}} Ohsht
{{champion:24}} ...
{{champion:77}} OH SHI-
{{champion:112}} Since he presumably neither swings that way nor is he a fan of flesh anyway, he'll probably turn me into a robot

k, fk this to the females!

{{champion:60}} ...eh...hope she's not one of the spiders who eats her mate
{{champion:84}} ^_^
{{champion:37}} Quite a duet we'd write, I used to be all about music theory
{{champion:89}} {{champion:10}} *whistles* I like strong independent but tender women heheh

>{{champion:89}} {{champion:10}} _whistles_ I like strong independent but tender women heheh

It's dangerous to go alone! Take this.
https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/7/7b/Kitchen-Modern-Can-Opener.jpg
{{champion:60}} she is. She most definitely is.
{{champion:1}}
Well. This is awkward. Some real game of thrones stuff right here lmao.

{{champion:22}} 

Probably doesn't miss at beat, because she's played this game before.
Except now you have to worry about Tryndamere coming  after you
God help you if you don't have any CC

{{champion:40}} 

"Janna."

"Yes babe?"

"I will literally fucking kill for you."

"That's sweet. You're still replaceable."

"Fuuuuuu."

One question. How do you feel about Anivia?

I feel like I am noticing a pattern here.
{{champion:254}}  Uhm.... I will be send to the hospital but happy!

> [{quoted}](name=RogueWill,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=BNzrqqoi,comment-id=001c,timestamp=2015-07-28T01:04:49.271+0000)
>
> {{champion:254}}  Uhm.... I will be send to the hospital but happy!

Yay another {{champion:254}} fan ~
She'd probably be into fisting. ;_;
{{champion:131}}  Sucks to be you guys, I'm good.

*Makes you join a moon cult and forces you to watch her slaughter everyone you meet who refuses to join*

Yup, have fun.
Don't forget the constant, mediocre moon jokes
That's the second best part.
I'll trade you! Though you should be careful, Graves didn't take his last breakup very well... {{champion:4}}
{{champion:222}}  I'm gonna need some bullet proof vests a bomb squad suit and some rubber gloves for sure...

{{champion:103}} {{champion:103}}

Oh fuck.

At least I'll always have a bottle opener or something, I dunno.  My anus is not ready.

riven mains.....

For the honeymoon, we're going on a _**Magical Journey!**_

You just need to come out of your shell.

He is hot as phoenix fire.

Go get him tiger.
{{champion:127}}  I think she'd be a little frigid at first, but once she stops giving me the cold shoulder I think we'd get along n**ice**ly.

{{champion:134}} 

Balls to the wall  ᕕ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)ᕗ

if i was a female yordle, then im happy as hell

regardless, itd be great

Year long tan though.
